text: is a railway station on the Hitahikosan Line in Tōhō, Fukuoka, Japan, operated by Kyushu Railway Company (JR Kyushu). ==Lines== Hōshuyama Station is served by the Hitahikosan Line. ==Adjacent stations== ==See also== * List of railway stations in Japan ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1937
title: Hōshuyama Station
